```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Members
members = c(
"Alexander Modell","Andi Wang","Andrea Becsek","Andrew Jones","Anthony Lee",
"Chang Zhang","Christophe Andrieu","Hamza Alawiye","Henry Reeve", "Ian Gallagher", 
"Jennifer Chakravarty","Mark Beaumont","Mathieu Gerber","Mauro Camara Escudero","Mingxuan Yi",
"Nick Whiteley","Patrick Rubin-Delanchy","Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot","Robert Allison","Sam Tickle",
"Song Liu","Tjun Yee Hoh")
status =     c("PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", 
               "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR",
               "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
               "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
               "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR")
presenting_members <- members[ifelse(status == "PRESENTER", T, F)]
# Date of Presentation
dates_tb1 <- seq(as.Date("2020-10-19"), as.Date("2020-12-21"), by="weeks")
dates_tb2 <- seq(as.Date("2020-02-08"), as.Date("2020-03-08"), by="weeks")
dates     <- c(dates_tb1, dates_tb2)
# Order of Presentations
index     <- c(5, 7, 3, 6, 2, 11, 4, 8, 9, 1, 13, 10, 15, 12, 14)
names <- presenting_members[index]
# ZOOM during COVID
location <- rep("ZOOM", length(presenting_members))
schedule <- data.frame(Date=dates,Name=names, Room=location)
knitr::kable(schedule)
```
